DOC.brief_title: The Pacing ( Guided Vs Unguided ) Strategies Study
DOC.detailed_description: This experiment aim accomplish two goal : collect additional metabolic flexibility data young fit adult response exercise ; demonstrate automate pace guidance generate real-time thermal-work strain monitoring optimize pacing policy allow less stressful completion time ( 60 minute ) treadmill exercise 5 mile . Each participant undergo two treatment first UNGUIDED follow GUIDED exercise . The two exercise session conduct part ~24 hour stay indirect calorimetry chamber .
